content: woven blocks crochet quilt abbreviations chain - chain beg - beginning space - space slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet blo - back loop only note this afghan is worked using worsted weight yarn in the colors specified with each project it is made up of simple mini granny squares general directions follow below simply crochet the number of squares needed for each block in the color required then assemble as described in instructions solid color granny finished square measures approximately 3 chain 4 join with a slip_stitch to first chain to form a ring round 1 chain 3 2 double_crochet in ring chain 1 3 double_crochet in ring chain 1 three times join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain 3 round 2 chain 3 turn 2 double_crochet in first chain 1 space chain 1 3 double_crochet in same chain 1 space chain 1 3 double_crochet chain 1 3 double_crochet chain 1 in remaining 3 chain 1 sps join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain 3 finish off weave in loose ends woven blocks afghan afghan is made up of 12 blocks total 3 blocks wide by 4 blocks long materials needed 28 oz medium blue worsted weight yarn 22 oz light blue worsted weight yarn 8 oz white worsted weight yarn size h crochet hook or size needed for proper gauge tapestry needle block assembly using tapestry needle and appropriate color yarn and stitching through blo assemble each individual block using the diagram on next page for placement 12 blocks total required color key white medium blue light blue afghan assembly using tapestry needle and appropriate color yarn and stitching through blo assemble the 12 completed blocks into a grid 3 blocks wide by 4 blocks long see cover photo border round 1 with medium blue yarn join with a slip_stitch to any corner chain 1 space single_crochet around work 3 single_crochet in each corner chain 1 space join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet to join round 2 chain 3 turn double_crochet in each single_crochet around work 3 double_crochet in each corner join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain 3 to join round 3 chain 1 turn single_crochet in each double_crochet around work 3 single_crochet in each corner join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet to join finish off weave in loose ends every effort has been made to ensure the accuracy of these instructions we
